text.div:
Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme

Code Description Comment Version
2.3 The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name". Note that the escape sequences used in this mode do not use the ASCII “esc” character, as defined in ISO 2022-1994. They are “HL7 escape sequences” as first defined in HL7 2.3, sec. 2.9.2. (Also, note that sections 2.8.28.6.1and 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 correspond to sections 2.16.93 and 2.7.2 in HL7 2. 5.) added v2.3.1
<null> This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message. This is the default. added v2.3.1
ISO 2022-1994 This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". . Note that the escape sequences used in this mode do not use the ASCII “esc” character, as defined in ISO 2022-1994. They are “HL7 escape sequences” as first defined in HL7 2.3, sec. 2.9.2. (Also, note that sections 2.8.28.6.1and 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 correspond to sections 2.16.93 and 2.7.2 in HL7 2. 5.) added v2.3.1

name: v2.0356
title: v2 Alternate character set handling scheme
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0356 ( Alternate character set handling scheme)

extension.valueString: Note that the escape sequences used in this mode do not use the ASCII “esc” character, as defined in ISO 2022-1994. They are “HL7 escape sequences” as first defined in HL7 2.3, sec. 2.9.2. (Also, note that sections 2.8.28.6.1and 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 correspond to sections 2.16.93 and 2.7.2 in HL7 2. 5.)

Merk op dat de escape-tekens in deze modus het ASCII-teken "esc", zoals gedefinieerd in ISO 2022-1994 niet gebruiken. Het zijn "HL7 escape-tekens" zoals voor het eerst gedefinieerd in HL7 2.3, sectie 2.9.2 (Merk ook op dat secties 2.8.28.6.1 en 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 overeenkomen met

concept.display: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".

designation.value: De modus om te wisselen van tekenset gedefinieerd in HL7 2.5, sectie 2.A.46, "XPN - uitgebreide persoonsnaam".

concept.display: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.

designation.value: Dit is de standaardwaarde, om aan te geven dat er geen wisselingen van tekenset voorkomen in dit bericht.

extension.valueString: Note that the escape sequences used in this mode do not use the ASCII “esc” character, as defined in ISO 2022-1994. They are “HL7 escape sequences” as first defined in HL7 2.3, sec. 2.9.2. (Also, note that sections 2.8.28.6.1and 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 correspond to sections 2.16.93 and 2.7.2 in HL7 2. 5.)

Deze standaard definieert een escape-reeks van basale 1 byte tekenset naar gespecificeerde andere tekenset en vice versa. De escape-reeks specificeert expliciet welke alternatieve tekenset wordt aangeroepen. Merk op dat in deze modus het werkelijke ASCII esc-teken …

concept.display: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

designation.value: Deze standaard heet "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique".
